column3: Bob was born to Robert Bennett

column3: Bob and sister Robin adopted by the Coulson family
column4: Bob and sister Robin adopted by the Coulson family

column3: He maxed out his credit cards, was in debt from college, and owed many people money.
column4: He maxed out his credit cards, was in debt from college, and owed many people money.

column3: Began purchasing supplies like duct tape and a stun gun for the killings. Kept them in a backpack.
column4: Began purchasing supplies like duct tape and a stun gun for the killings. Kept them in a backpack.

column3: Scoped out a dark drop-off site
column4: Scoped out a dark drop-off site

column3: Dropped off backpack and gas at parents’ house,  and checked out their wills to see who their heirs were.
column4: Dropped off backpack and gas at parents’ house,  and checked out their wills to see who their heirs were.

column3: Called parents’ attorney to ask about the size of the inheritance
column4: Called parents’ attorney to ask about the size of the inheritance

column3: Attended families funeral (where he showed no emotion, smiled, and performed a dance step when leaving), then later arrested for the murders of his 5 family members
column4: Attended families funeral (where he showed no emotion, smiled, and performed a dance step when leaving), then later arrested for the murders of his 5 family members

column3: Sentenced to death for the killings
column4: Sentenced to death for the killings

column3: Texas Court of Appeals confirmed the verdict and death sentence
column4: Texas Court of Appeals confirmed the verdict and death sentence

column3: Found liable for $26.6 million for the slayings of his family in a wrongful death suit filed by the family estate and 4 yr. old sole survivor of the killings
column4: Found liable for $26.6 million for the slayings of his family in a wrongful death suit filed by the family estate and 4 yr. old sole survivor of the killings

column3: The Court of Criminal Appeals denies his last appeal, ending his state appeals.

column3: Executed by lethal injection in a Texas prison
